account_registered_as_a_proxy_is_not_all: This bank account is currently registered as a proxy, and cannot set another proxy without first unregistering as a proxy. To unregister this bank account, use the Register Voting Proxy tab on the Tools page.
account_that_uses_a_proxy_is_not_allowed: This bank account currently has set it's votes to another proxy, and cannot itself register as a proxy. To remove the set proxy, click the Change Voter Proxy button on the Governance Voting page.
error_account_does_not_exist: This bank account name does not exist on the Arisen network.
error_account_name_not_available: This Arisen bank account name has already been taken.
error_accountName_not_unique_in_contacts: This Arisen bank account name is already in your list of contacts.
error_cannot_transfer_to_self: Invalid recipient, cannot transfer funds to self.
error_arisen_assert_message_exception: The Arisen decentralized banking network returned a generic error based on your request. Please check that the information is valid and try again.
error_invalid_accountName: Invalid Arisen bank account name, make sure it is comprised of 1 to 12 letters.
error_invalid_activeKey: Invalid Active Key, make sure it starts with 'RIX' and is comprised of 53 characters.
error_invalid_memo: Invalid Memo, must not contain any bank account-related Bank Account's Private Keys and must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_ownerKey: Invalid Owner Key for bank account, make sure it starts with 'RIX' and is comprised of 53 characters.
error_invalid_ramAmount: Invalid RAM Amount, a valid amount should be a whole number with no decimals, eg. '1200'.
error_invalid_website: Invalid website, must start with 'http://' or 'https://'.
error_invalid_name: Invalid Name value, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_logo_256: Invalid Logo url, must begin with 'http://' or 'https://'.
error_invalid_slogan: Invalid Slogan, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_background: Invalid Background value, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_philosophy: Invalid Philosophy value, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_wechat: Invalid Wechat username, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_dpay: Invalid dPay username, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_telegram: Invalid Telegram group, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_no_stake_left: Unable to set staked amount to 0. Doing so would prevent you from performing any bank transactions on the decentralized banking network.
error_not_enough_balance: Insufficient available RIX balance to complete bank transaction.
error_not_enough_delegated_bw_for_new_ac: You need to delegate some Bandwidth resources to the new Arisen bank account.
error_not_enough_delegated_cpu_for_new_a: You need to delegate some CPU resources to the new Arisen bank account.
error_not_valid_account_name: This is not a valid Arisen-based bank account name
error_not_valid_stake_amount: Not a valid Stake Amount (must have be a positive amount with a maximum of 4 decimals of precision eg. 12.1212).
error_ram_has_to_be_over_minimum_amount: A minimum of 3 bytes of RAM is required per bank transaction.
error_ram_not_valid_amount: Invalid RAM amount. A valid amount should be a whole number with no decimals.
error_ram_under_minimum_for_new_account: A minimum of 4000 Bytes of RAM is required to create a new Arisen bank account.
error_ram_under_minimum_of_2600_for_new_: A minimum of 2600 Bytes of RAM is required to create a new Arisen bank account.
error_ram_usage_exceeded: RAM usage exceeded. You will need to buy more ram to carry out this action.
error_ram_using_more_than_usage: Insufficient available RAM balance to complete transaction.
error_transferring_to_exchange_without_m: Cannot transfer funds to an exchange without passing the memo that was given.
global_account_import_private_descriptio: To import additional accounts, simply enter the Bank Account's Private Key. aVote will convert it to a public key and lookup all Arisen bank accounts with relevant permissions.
global_account_import_private_key: Bank Account's Private Key (51 characters and starts with the number 5)
global_account_import_private_requires_h: This action requires an existing HotBank.

Swap to an existing HotBank before importing to proceed. If you are using your Arise bank account in RoboBanker mode only, and wish to use the HotBank features, please reset the application and import the HotBank first.
global_account_import_select_accounts: Select one or more accounts to import with this Bank Account's Private Key
global_account_import_watch_description: Import an account as a RoboBanker, which can monitor the bank account and create unsigned bank transactions.
global_account_request_account: Create Bank Bank Account Request Code (BARC)
global_accounts_dropdown_no_accounts: No additional bank accounts created. To get started go to 'Tools', then 'Manage Bank Accounts'.
global_button_elevate_failure_header: The password entered does not match that of the Arisen-based bank account currently selected.
global_button_elevate_modal_description: Enter the Arisen-based bank account password to continue
global_dangerlink_warning_body_1: avote can not vouch for the safety of the website you are about to visit. Please be dilligent with the security of your keys and account information, only sharing information when you are absolutely sure it can be trusted.
global_dangerlink_warning_body_2: Never share your Arisen bank account's Bank Account's Private Keys.
global_dangerlink_warning_body_3: If you wish to proceed, confirm below.
global_dangerlink_warning_title: Warning: You are leaving this app
global_modal_settings_customtoken_descri: Enter the bank account for any Custom Private Currency contract you wish to monitor.
global_modal_settings_customtoken_form_a: Enter the bank account name associated with the contract...
global_modal_settings_customtoken_header: Add Custom Private Currency to Track
global_modal_settings_customtoken_none_t: No Custom Private Currency accounts tracked.
global_modal_settings_customtoken_notfou: The details for the currency entered could not be found.
global_settings_idle_timeout_fifteen_min: Automatically lock bank account(s) after 15 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_idle_timeout_five_minute: Automatically lock bank account(s) after 5 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_idle_timeout_sixty_minut: Automatically lock bank account(s) after 60 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_idle_timeout_thirty_minu: Automatically lock bank account(s) after 30 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_skip_link_modal_do_not_s: Display warnings when links are clicked
global_settings_skip_link_modal_skip: Never display warnings when links are clicked
global_settings_filter_spam_transfers_do: Do not filter out spam bank transfers
global_settings_filter_spam_transfers_0_: Filter out bank transfers with a 0.0001 amount
Filter out bank transfers with an amount under 0.0010
Filter out bank transfers with an amount under 0.0100
Filter out bank transfers with an amount under 0.1000
global_transaction_actions_details_conte: Each action within this bank transaction are listed below.
global_transaction_complete_message: Your transaction(s) have been submitted to the Arisen decentralized banking network.
global_transaction_complete_warning_mess: Submitting a bank transaction does not guarantee it will be confirmed. To ensure that this bank transaction has been completed and confirmed within the decentralized banking network, please reference the above transaction ID on a Arisen banking explorer to ensure it enters the last irreversible block.
global_transaction_full_details_content: The full data from this bank transaction is listed below.
global_transaction_message_error_authori: The 'owner' Bank Account's Private Key associated with your Arisen-based bank account is currently imported, which currently can only be used to issue the 'updateauth' command.
The authorizations of this bank account no longer matches the key currently imported.
The current Bank Account's Private Key has insufficient permissions to execute the selected action.

The Bank Account's Private Key can be changed by either removing the current bank account and reimporting its Bank Account's Private Key, or by completely resetting the Arisen-based bank account and rerunning the import process.
The Bank Account's Private Key used in this Arisen-based bank account cannot perform the selected action.
global_transaction_unsigned_message: An unsigned bank transaction has been created by this RoboBanker mode. Use the button below to save it as a file which can then be signed by a BankVault.
global_transaction_unsigned_save_file: Save Unsigned Bank Transaction to Disk
global_transaction_unsigned_warning_mess: Each Arisen-based bank transaction must be signed and broadcast within one hour of it's creation.
invalid_proxy_specified: The proxy account that was specified does not exist. If it is a valid bank account make sure that it has registered as a proxy voter.
